name: KALEIDOSTUDIO - The Recording Studio Adventure!
description:
KALEIDOGAME - The adventure in the recording studio! is a small demonstration video game made by two composers, certainly not programmers, who have ventured into creating a virtual tour of their studio where it will be possible to interact with objects, musical instruments and some minigames.

KALEIDOGAME was made through the use of Fmod Studio, Unity and Game Creator.

For more information, please visit our website: www.kaleidostudiomusic.com

Video Game created by:

Andrea Caranfil: Game design, Composer, Audio implementation

Massimiliano Vizzini: Game design, Composer, Audio implementation

Flavio Cangialosi: Additional music and Sound Design
